Articles.Content:
http://www.physorg.com/news/2011-11-china-nation-space-docking.html

Will Harvester let Kerbal be left behind like this? Kerbal-China space race is on!

Already beaten.

Awesome.

But why is Kerbin\'s Ocean so yellow?
His graphics card can\'t handle it-that\'s essentially the emergency backup texture system.

It\'s better than my old laptop.

With that you had 15min+ loading time for the game, the sky was PINK, all spaceship parts, vanilla and mod were black and the sea looked like fluffy clouds.

But how can you see a black spaceship in space?

On this laptop the real Kerbin textures start to work at about 800,000m+.
